name: llm-server-dashboard
description: OpenUI5 real-time monitoring dashboard for LLM inference server

scripts.build:components: cd components && bun install && bun run build:prod && rm -rf ../components-dist && cp -R dist ../components-dist && mkdir -p ../components-dist/NetworkGraph && cp NetworkGraph/styles.css ../components-dist/NetworkGraph/styles.css && mkdir -p ../components-dist/ProcessFlow && cp ProcessFlow/processflow.css ../components-dist/ProcessFlow/processflow.css
scripts.build: npm run build:components && ui5 build && mkdir -p dist/components-dist && cp -R components-dist/. dist/components-dist/
